explicitModifiers.text: Adds 5 to 12 Physical Damage to Attacks
+(150-1000) to Evasion Rating while on Full Life
30% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Full Life

lines.flavourText: To catch an animal, think like an animal.

lines.name: Lightbane Raiment

explicitModifiers.text: (10-30)% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Reflects (10-30) Chaos Damage to Melee Attackers
(25-100)% chance to create Desecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
. . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.

lines.name: Mindspiral

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (5-15)% of Maximum Mana as Extra Maximum Energy Shield
Enemies Cannot Leech Mana From you
(5-10)% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
(5-20)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

lines.flavourText: Where top is bottom and weak is strong.

lines.name: The Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (15-29) Added Chaos Damage
Socketed Gems Cost and Reserve Life instead of Mana
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 100% of Base Mana Cost

lines.flavourText:
My Soul is your Strength
My Price is your Blood

lines.name: Doedre's Scorn

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-2) to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
(10-20)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Curse on Enemy
Adds 37 to 71 Chaos Damage for each Curse on the Enemy
Curse Skills have (30-50)% increased Skill Effect Duration

lines.flavourText:
A scar of the flesh you'll never forget,
A scar of the mind you'll never remember.

lines.name: Hrimsorrow

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-7) to (13-15) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
(25-100)% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects (10-100) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
Of ancient giants, none remain,
Their only trace is timeless pain.

lines.name: Malachai's Loop

implicitModifiers.text: (10-22)% increased Spell Damage
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
(6-16)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
Thaumaturgy has no limit.
It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.

lines.name: Hrimnor's Resolve

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently
100% chance to Avoid being Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
Hrimnor's presence was as cold as ice,
but his heart burned for vengeance.

lines.name: Briskwrap
lines.flavourText:
"I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

lines.name: Fractal Thoughts

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(25-40)% to Critical Strike Multiplier if Dexterity is higher than Intelligence
15% increased Dexterity if Strength is higher than Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
"The more the warrior understood Tangmazu's gift, the less the mask aided him.
His dreams were filled with divine laughter."
- Tenth Song of the Islands

lines.name: Kalisa's Grace

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Faster Casting
Gain +2% to Critical Strike Chance for 2 seconds after Spending a total of 800 Mana

lines.flavourText:
"You shall hang, in blissful agony, on my every note."
- Kalisa, Prima Donna of Sarn

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Fire Damage
(10-150)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons
-(60-5) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Ahn's Heritage

implicitModifiers.text: +(10-20) to maximum Life

explicitModifiers.text: -10% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage
+(2-3)% to all maximum Resistances while you have no Endurance Charges
You have Onslaught while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
"It's not Karui, Azmeri or even Vaal in origin,
but one thing is certain. It is very, very old."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 46

lines.name: Kintsugi

explicitModifiers.text: (20-35)% less Damage taken if you have not been Hit Recently
(50-100)% increased Evasion Rating if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
Do not hide your flaws, your cracks,
mend them, and display them proudly.
For it is these that set us apart.

lines.name: Soul Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (14-20) Spell Totem
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems
Inflicts a random Level 20 Curse on you when your Totems die
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die, with 80% increased Effect
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die, with 80% more Effect
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die

lines.flavourText:
The greatest mistakes cause suffering 
long after they have been made

lines.name: Voll's Protector

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

lines.name: Wake of Destruction

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 120 Lightning Damage to Attacks
Drops Shocked Ground while moving, lasting 2 seconds
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee

lines.flavourText:
Tempest's power given form,
Flee before the walking storm.

lines.name: The Queen's Hunger

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Level 20 Bone Offering, Flesh Offering or Spirit Offering every 5 seconds
Offering Skills Triggered this way also affect you

Trigger Level 20 Bone Offering, Flesh Offering, Spirit Offering every 5 seconds in sequence
Offering Skills Triggered this way also affect you
Regenerate 2% of Energy Shield per second if you've Consumed a Corpse Recently
1.5% of Evasion Rating is Regenerated as Life per second while Focussed
29% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life while Focussed
Regenerate 2% of Mana per second if you've Consumed a corpse Recently
120% increased Effect of Fortify on you while Focussed
Regenerate 200 Energy Shield per second while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
Recover (37-40)% of Mana and Energy Shield when you Focus
(50-120)% increased Effect of Fortify on you while Focused
(10-12)% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage from Hits during Soul Gain Prevention
1.5% of Evasion Rating is Regenerated as Life per second while Focused
(18-32)% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life while Focused
+(3227-3987) to Armour during Soul Gain Prevention

lines.flavourText:
In their crimson nightmare, the Vaal are still sacrificing themselves to her glory and beauty. 
They stab their own hearts and cry out in ecstasy, only to rise again.

lines.name: Aurseize

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: Wealth is not to be borne lightly.

lines.name: Grip of the Council

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
Death does not remove you from our grasp.
Death only brings you closer.

lines.name: Great Old One's Ward

implicitModifiers.text: 3% increased Movement Speed

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-12) to (15-20) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The horrors we've encountered are nothing
compared to the horrors we haven't.

lines.name: The Bringer of Rain

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (18-30) Melee Physical Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (12-30) Faster Attacks
Socketed Gems are supported by Level (6-30) Blind
Adds 20 to 30 Physical Damage to Attacks
(10-20)% chance to gain an Endurance Charge when you Block

lines.flavourText:
"What lies beneath your feet?!"
"Sacred ground, watered with tears of blood!"

lines.name: Atziri's Mirror

implicitModifiers.text: 6% increased Movement Speed
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced Duration of Curses on you
+10% Chance to Block Attack Damage while not Cursed
+20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while Cursed

lines.flavourText:
"As long as I see death in my mirror, so will Wraeclast."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Redblade Tramplers

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (2-5) to (7-10) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Our home was swallowed beneath 
the great mountain for our complacency. 
Now we must prove our value to the Molten One 
by sating his hunger for life.

lines.name: Asenath's Mark

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with a Bow, with a 0.3 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
Asenath's mind was as quick and nimble
as the fingers that drew her bowstring.

lines.name: Blackgleam

implicitModifiers.text: 4 to 8 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks
Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Bow Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (30-50)% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Adds 5 to 10 Fire Damage to Bow Attacks
5 to 10 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Molten feathers, veiled spark,
Hissing arrows from the dark.

lines.name: Bramblejack

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 2 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
-(15-2) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
(30-1000)% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker

lines.flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

lines.name: Briskwrap
lines.flavourText:
"I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

lines.name: Daresso's Courage

implicitModifiers.text: (120-180)% increased Block Recovery

+(20-100)% Chance to Block Attack Damage if you have Blocked Spell Damage Recently
+(20-100)% chance to Block Spell Damage if you have Blocked Attack Damage Recently

lines.flavourText:
By tourney's end, Daresso bled and shivered.
Yet even accursed treachery failed to steal the champion's victory.

lines.name: Drillneck

implicitModifiers.text: Arrows Pierce an additional Target

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (10-14) to (19-24) Physical Damage to Bow Attacks
(10-14) to (19-24) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
Arrows deal 50% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments to Targets they Pierce

lines.flavourText:
"Why waste such a fine arrow on just one man?" 
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

lines.name: Hyrri's Bite

implicitModifiers.text: +(6-8) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
+(3-8) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (3-8) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Cold Damage to Attacks
+(2-3) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (2-3) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
A Karui woman's place was not the 
battlefield, but the hearth.
Hyrri changed all of that.

lines.name: Shavronne's Pace

explicitModifiers.text: (20-35)% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne raced to Brutus' side,
her last hope against the Karui tide.

lines.name: Sin Trek

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies Cannot Leech Life From you

lines.flavourText: Do not let them step on your feet. Keep them at bay.

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Shock Ground when Hit
Adds 1 to (60-80) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
5% chance to create Shocked Ground when Hit
20% chance to Curse non-Cursed Enemies with a random Curse on Hit
(10-20)% chance to Curse non-Cursed Enemies with a random Hex on Hit
Curse Enemies which Hit you with a random Hex, ignoring Curse Limit

lines.flavourText:
An angry god is one thing, 
but you should really fear a god 
with an unpredictable sense of humour.

lines.name: Corpsewalker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Corpse Walk when Equipped
(20-40)% increased Damage if you have Consumed a corpse Recently
For each nearby corpse, Regenerate 8 Life per second
For each nearby corpse, 1% increased Movement Speed
For each nearby corpse, Regenerate 0.25% Life per second, up to 3%

lines.flavourText:
Every glorious conquest
stands astride innocent bones.

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.name: Southbound

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (30-72) to (44-100) Cold Damage to Attacks
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

lines.name: Elevore

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (100-200) Life when you Suppress Spell Damage

lines.flavourText:
Ancient worshippers of the Greatwolf were overtaken
by a ravenous hunger for all things mystical.

lines.name: Ralakesh's Impatience

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

Count as having maximum number of Endurance Charges
Count as having maximum number of Frenzy Charges
Count as having maximum number of Power Charges

Minimum Endurance Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Frenzy Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Power Charges equal to Maximum while stationary

Count as having maximum number of Endurance Charges
Count as having maximum number of Frenzy Charges
Count as having maximum number of Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
The Master of a Million Faces lived by one
simple ethos: why make the effort, when
you can simply mimic what others have?

lines.name: Chitus' Apex

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
"It takes true strength to hold power,
and my grip grows tighter by the day."
 - Emperor Chitus

lines.name: Lioneye's Vision

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Pierce
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
"The Virtue Gems are a gift from the land, 
our land, and we will not let our gifts
be destroyed by savages."
- Marceus Lioneye

lines.name: Nomic's Storm

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Damage taken while on Full Energy Shield
20% increased Movement Speed while on Full Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: It takes a clear mind to outrun a storm.

lines.name: Ezomyte Peak
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of servitude, a day
of glory, an eternity of death.

lines.name: The Blood Dance

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
(3-4)% reduced Attack and Cast Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate (0.5-1)% of Life per second per Frenzy Charge
(20-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
(3-30)% increased Damage per Frenzy Charge with Hits against Enemies on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
"Sharks thrash and swirl 
To the pounding drum of their frenzied hearts
As they dance in the waters red."
-Lavianga, Guardian of the Karui Way

lines.name: Zahndethus' Cassock

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (25-40) Lightning Damage to Attacks
(25-100)% chance to create Consecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls
Walls of Light, not of brick
Twice as strong and twice as thick

lines.name: Dialla's Malefaction

explicitModifiers.text: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +(1-2) to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +(10-30)% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain (25-100)% increased Experience

lines.flavourText:
He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

lines.name: Asphyxia's Wrath

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Projectile Speed

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
40% reduced Area of Effect of Hex Skills
Hexes on Slain Enemies are transferred to a nearby Enemy
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies in a range of 30 when Hexed Enemy dies
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies within 3 metres when Hexed Enemy dies

lines.flavourText:
Mist of breath
Icing to lips and throat
As the warm ones choke and fall
Upon the frozen wasteland.

lines.name: Ghostwrithe

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: Faith springs abundant at the edge of death.

lines.name: Atziri's Step
lines.flavourText:
"Those who dance are considered insane 
by those who cannot hear the music."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Chernobog's Pillar

implicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to maximum Life

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-15) to (15-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
(5-25)% chance to Curse non-Cursed Enemies with Enfeeble on Hit
(5-25)% chance to Curse Non-Cursed Enemies with Enfeeble on Hit, with 80% increased Effect

lines.flavourText:
Fire dances with those who doubt
Licks the skin and flesh from the fearful
Where there is no fear
There is no flame

lines.name: Crown of Thorns

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 5 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
+(5-25) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
Lift it lightly, don it slow.
The spikes point out and in, you know.

lines.name: Deerstalker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (11-15) Trap
(15-30)% increased Movement Speed for 9 seconds on Throwing a Trap

lines.flavourText: Anticipation, preparation, exhilaration, celebration.

lines.name: Goldwyrm

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

lines.name: Hrimburn

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-7) to (13-15) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
(25-100)% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects (10-100) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
Giant's blood you cannot tame,
as wild as an unwatched flame.

lines.name: Kitava's Thirst

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text:
(30-50)% chance to Trigger Socketed Spells when
you Spend at least 100 Mana to Use a Skill

(30-50)% chance to Trigger Socketed Spells when
you Spend at least 100 Mana to Use a Skill, with a 0.1 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
Tukohama, Tawhoa and Kitava went to the lake to fish.
Tawhoa weaved a net to catch the fish,
Tukohama built a fire to cook the fish,
and Kitava swallowed the entire lake, fish and all, with a single gulp.

lines.name: Leer Cast

explicitModifiers.text: You and nearby allies gain (15-50)% increased Damage

lines.flavourText: For none of us are as cruel as all of us.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

implicitModifiers.text: +(20-25) to maximum Mana
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (1-4)% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate (15.3-75) Life per second per Endurance Charge
(100-200)% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Devoto's Devotion

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Swift as thought are the actions of Man 
when borne on wings of divine providence.

lines.name: Lycosidae

implicitModifiers.text: +(10-20) to maximum Life
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 250 to 300 Cold Damage to Retaliation Skills
Adds 250 to 300 Cold Damage to Counterattacks

lines.flavourText: A true predator does not chase; It waits.

lines.name: Doedre's Tenure

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
While Doedre lacked Maligaro's sense of style,
she surpassed her master in pure malevolence.

lines.name: Skirmish

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Global Accuracy Rating
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Attack Skills have +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems

lines.flavourText:
If two great leaders like Lioneye and Kaom
had been on the same side of the battle,
nothing would remain unconquered.

lines.name: Victario's Flight

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
(10-30)% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life

10% increased Movement Speed for you and nearby Allies
Quicksilver Flasks you Use also apply to nearby Allies

lines.flavourText:
Alive but not unscathed, Victario fled
as slaughter blossomed at the gates.

lines.name: Giantsbane

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (3-8) to (10-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The monstrous men of yore used bows too,
theirs were just bigger.

lines.name: Curtain Call

Skills which throw Mines throw up to 1 additional Mine if you have at least 800 Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Sing with me one last duet,
the curtain closes nigh.
Join me in a quiet song,
Before we all must die.

lines.name: Facebreaker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (600-1000)% more Physical Damage with Unarmed Attacks
(600-1000)% more Physical Damage with Unarmed Melee Attacks

lines.flavourText: Fly like a Storm Crow, crush like a Rhoa

10% chance to Dodge Spell Hits while Phasing

lines.flavourText:
Move in with haste.
Strike quick, strike hard.
Vanish like smoke in the wind.

lines.name: Brinerot Flag

lines.flavourText: The lords of the sea bow to no one.

Your Skills deal you 400% of Mana Spent on Upfront Skill Mana Costs as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The sharper the pain, the sharper the mind. 
A curious paradox."	
- Shavronne of Umbra

lines.name: Trolltimber Spire

lines.flavourText:
The problem with working fresh trolltimber:
by the time you've carved out one end, 
the other has sprouted fresh roots!

lines.name: Voidbringer

lines.flavourText: Absolute corruption empowers absolutely.

lines.name: Windscream

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse

lines.flavourText:
The mocking wind, a shielding spell,
The haunting screams, a maddening hell.

lines.name: Goldrim

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 4 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.

lines.name: Victario's Charity

implicitModifiers.text: +(8-16)% to all Elemental Resistances

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

5% chance to grant a Frenzy Charge to nearby Allies on Hit

lines.flavourText: A man's life is the greatest gift he can give.

lines.name: Torchoak Step

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Totems Reflect (25-100)% of their maximum Life as Fire Damage to nearby Enemies when Hit

lines.flavourText:
Centuries ago, there existed a unique grove imbued with ancestral fire.
As with all things, the Karui used its wood for war.

lines.name: Wondertrap

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Rarity of Items found when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Wonders abound at death's door.

lines.name: Bones of Ullr

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Raise Zombie Gems
+1 to Level of all Raise Spectre Gems

lines.flavourText:
The dead man walks where
the living fear to tread.

lines.name: Deidbell

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
Skills which Exert an Attack have (20-40)% chance to not count that Attack

lines.flavourText: May you never hear it toll.

lines.name: Fairgraves' Tricorne

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (6-15) to (12-25) Cold Damage to Attacks
You can be Touched by Tormented Spirits

lines.flavourText:
Fairgraves' trusty tricorne accompanied him far across
the seas, deep under the ground, and even beyond death.

lines.name: Geofri's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Holy Relics
Summoned Holy Relics have (20-25)% reduced Cooldown Recovery Rate

lines.flavourText:
In the battle for honour, Geofri won.
Not so, the battle for survival.

lines.name: Matua Tupuna

implicitModifiers.text: (5-15)% increased Spell Damage
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
10% increased Effect of Auras on you
10% increased Effect of Aura Buffs on you
(10-20)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills on your Minions
10% increased Effect of Auras on your Minions
10% increased Effect of Aura Buffs on your Minions
(10-20)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
Spreads Tar when you take a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
You carried me through life,
The least I can do is carry you through death.

lines.name: Rearguard

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 6 to 12 Physical Damage to Bow Attacks
6 to 12 Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
"It's a rare man that has eyes in the back of his head."
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

lines.name: Solaris Lorica

explicitModifiers.text: 25% reduced Chaos Damage taken over time
Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Give me neither havens nor solace;
They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

lines.name: Stormcharger

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText: Like lightning, the Ezomyte cavalry need never strike twice.

lines.name: Blackgleam

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (24-27) Fire Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
5 to 10 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Molten feathers, veiled spark,
Hissing arrows from the dark.

lines.name: Maloney's Nightfall

implicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

explicitModifiers.text: (8-10) to (14-16) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
25% chance to create a Smoke Cloud when Hit
(40-60)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Fear not the dark, the song of night,
Hear not the arch, the falling cry.
My giving sun, fight no more,
Rest alone, my grand nightfall.

lines.name: The Infinite Pursuit

explicitModifiers.text: Moving while Bleeding doesn't cause you to take extra Damage
Bleeding on you expires 75% slower while Moving
50% chance to be inflicted with Bleeding when Hit by an Attack

lines.flavourText:
We move to be closer to her, but the distance yet grows.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Uul-Netol}
